$\vari{\Delta V}$
 leaves a tube at a depth 
$\vari{h}$
 below the surface.

Assuming that all this work provides the kinetic energy of the emerging water, show that the speed 
$\vari{v}$
 of efflux (outflow) is 
$\vari{\sqrt {2gh}}$
.

[b] Find the values of the distances $\vari{x_{1}}$ , $\vari{x_{2}}$ and $\vari{x_{3}}$ in terms of $\vari{a}$ , and sketch a better diagram.
